definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

sentences.english: During the rounding process spontaneous contractions stopped and microtubules and myofibrils depolymerized.
sentences.chinese: 在變圓過程中微管及肌原纖維解聚，自發性收縮停止。

sentences.english: The arrangment of mitochondria was parallel to that of the myofibrils.
sentences.chinese: 線粒體含量豐富嵴密集，與肌原纖維基本呈平行。

sentences.english: The myofibrils are also thicker and there are a great deal of mitochondrias and glycogenic granules between the myofibrils.
sentences.chinese: 肌原纖維間的肌漿中有大量線粒體及糖原顆粒。

sentences.english: Fig . 9 Myocardium cell of Procambarus clark ii . Showing striation of myofibril.
sentences.chinese: 圖9螯蝦心肌細胞示肌原纖維的橫紋。

sentences.english: It's structural and functional unit of myofibrils.
sentences.chinese: 是肌原纖維結構和功能基本單位。

sentences.english: With the exception of domestic pigeons, the arrangement of myogenic fibers in the myocardial cells was loose.
sentences.chinese: 除家鴿外，心肌細胞的肌原纖維的排列比較鬆散。

sentences.english: Mitochondria are intercalated between myofibrils and completely filled the interstices between them.
sentences.chinese: 肌原纖維之間充滿着線粒體和橫管。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Z-lines broke, M- lines degraded and I band became white.
sentences.chinese: 同時肌原纖維的Z線斷裂，M線降解，I帶變白。

sentences.english: Fig. 9 Myocardium cell of Procambarus clarkii. Showing striation of myofibril.
sentences.chinese: 圖9螯蝦心肌細胞示肌原纖維的橫紋。

sentences.english: Different degrees of myofibril damage were found.
sentences.chinese: 肌原纖維也有不同程度損傷。
